Description: Glazed composition shabti with a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with a plaited beard, crossed hands in relief holding an adze and a hoe, the waist is inscribed with two rows of worn or softly incised, now illegible, Hieroglyphs, the front of the leg section is inscribed with a similar column, the back is decorated with an incised representation of a mesh seed-bag; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
